itemListElement.name: Tofu Bhurji – Vegan Bhurji (Indian Breakfast Scramble)

@graph.name: Tofu Bhurji Vegan Bhurji
@graph.description: Tofu Bhurji - Vegan Bhurji or Akoori . Indian Scrambled eggs. Tofu scrambled with onion, tomato, cilantro and cumin for a delicious Eggless Bhurji Scramble Breakfast. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Recipe.Can be soyfree with chickpea flour tofu
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp oil (or 2 tbsp broth for oilfree)
1/2  red or yellow onion (, finely chopped)
1  green chilli (, serrano or thai , finely chopped or use 2 tbsp finely chopped green bell pepper)
1/2 teaspoon ground cumin ( or ground coriander)
14 oz firm tofu (, lightly squeezed to remove extra dipping moisture and crumbled evenly)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 mins or until starting to get golden. Add garlic and chili and a pinch of salt and cook for another 2 mins until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 mins or until starting to get golden. Add garlic and chili and a pinch of salt and cook for another 2 mins until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add turmeric, cumin, black pepper and mix in. Add tomatoes and 1/4 tsp salt and mix in, cook for a minute to soften. (Add in other veggies such as peppers, zucchini etc with the tomatoes if you like)
recipeInstructions.name: Add turmeric, cumin, black pepper and mix in. Add tomatoes and 1/4 tsp salt and mix in, cook for a minute to soften. (Add in other veggies such as peppers, zucchini etc with the tomatoes if you like)

recipeInstructions.text: Add cilantro, crumbled tofu and 1/4 tsp salt and mix well. Cover and cook for 2 mins (longer for dryer). Taste and adjust.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cilantro, crumbled tofu and 1/4 tsp salt and mix well. Cover and cook for 2 mins (longer for dryer). Taste and adjust.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle in kala namak, and mix in for a few seconds and take off heat. Let sit for a minute before serving over toasts, pita bread or part of a breakfast bowl with roasted potatoes, crunchy greens.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle in kala namak, and mix in for a few seconds and take off heat. Let sit for a minute before serving over toasts, pita bread or part of a breakfast bowl with roasted potatoes, crunchy greens.

@graph.keywords: paneer bhurji, scrambled tofu indian style, soya bhurji, tofu akoori, tofu scramble, vegan bhurji
